context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: super Fantastic Awesome treatment .  He is friendly and good caring and I was fully happy.  No fear of treatment and very cordial

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: starting from 2021 we are getting treatment for my MIl under Dr. Nagesh and he is genuinely interested in the patients recovery more than the financial statements. he was always with a lot of patience and smile in speaking with the patients or the guardians. TMVr procedure went successfully under his guidance for  my MIL who was at high risk for open heart surgery. Before and after procedure was explained in detail which was adding more confidence

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hes just too good. No words to explain. Cool, calm and composed. Giving indepth details to patients. Solving the problem with atmost care. My father got angioplasty done under him and our experiance was excellent.

OSAM Gentlemen in this generation,May god Bless him with Health,Wealth,Happiness ,Prosperity,Its all from my Hearth,I ever Never forget this gentlemen who came as a miracle in our life who saved a life of our Professor,Hats of to him , Don't have any other words to Express,Regards,AHMED

** ** ** ******* ******.He had operated my dad and we have been visiting him for routine checkups often from 2012.His patience , his way of explaining the problems in simplest way which can be understood by everyone is very very good.We will be fearless after listening to him , even if its an operation.He listens to each and every aspect patient and his family tells,he is very friendly.
          I will highly recommend this doctor for any kind or heart related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother had calcium deposits and doctor used latest technology called IVL to remove the calcium using IVL shockwaves.... Blessed to get right treatment by right man... He is very friendly person.... Highly recommend... Saddest part is IVL is not covered in insurances as it is advanced treatment... Ended up paying 4 L from hand... Treatment wise great experience except insurance part

Recently I had terrible pain in my left shoulder extending it to entire upper back and right shoulder.I fortunately contacted Dr C M Nagesh and he diagnosed the problem correctly and treated me at Apollo hospital Bannerghatta,I have undergone Angiogram & Angioplasty .I did not felt any pain either during the procedure or post angio plastery.Doctor Nagesh was such a nice person  that 50% of disease will be cured once you met him.I thank Dr Nagesh & Apollo hospital

Dr. Nagesh C. M is an excellent doctor. He is very kind and cooperative. His expertise helped my uncle from avoiding a surgery and cleared the blockages by oral medicine. My uncle is regularly following up with him and he is supporting him patiently since 3 years. I would recommend him for others trust worthy doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Nagesh Sir is so humble and down to earth. He speaks very nicely and explains you the problem very well. ** *** *** ** **** ********* **** he can handle any difficult case. My dad had 100% blockage and one reputed hospital doctors told that there is no other way for treatment excep bypass surgery but we worried a lot, met many doctors but finally by god's grace we met Dr. C M Nagesh in Jaydeva where he gave confidence and told us this block can be cleared in angioplasty only,no need to go for Bypass surgery. Then after two days, he did angioplasty for my dad and he is alright now. I would like to conclude that Nagesh Sir is a specialist in Angioplasty. Thanks a lot Nagesh Sir.
Super..he is really such a nice person and he will listen to prob in a very calm way and even he will respond to problems beyond working hours...
